Description:
Lonsdale Deluxe 20Ft Competition Ring


UK MAINLAND DELIVERY ONLY

The Lonsdale Deluxe 20Ft Competition Ring is the perfect permanent addition to any gym or boxing club, featuring a heavy gauge steel construction with 18mm plywood boards along with a shock absorbing foam underlay with a heavy duty canvas cover. This boxing ring benefits from a 18" split level platform and comes complete with ring skirts, 4 ropes, corner pads, M10 ring tensioners and 2 sets of stools and steps.

> Boxing ring
> 20 foot platform with 18 foot fighting area
> Heavy duty canvas with brass eyelets and bungee cords
> 15mm shock absorbing foam underlay
> Colour coded framework for quick assembly
> Heavy gauge 3-5mm steel construction
> 18mm plywood boards
> 18" platform
> Ring skirts supplied
> 4 corner pads
> M10 rope tensioners for each corner
> 4 30mm ring ropes and rope tape included
> Complete with 2 stools and 2 steps
> Installation time 45 minutes (2 people)

DELIVERY:
> After placing your order you will receive a call from our specialist delivery team within 3 working days to discuss your delivery. We will endeavour to provide a AM or PM delivery slot of no more than 5 hours in length, however, this may not be possible in all instances.
> Delivery is free to mainland UK but can take up to 30 working days, some remote postcodes in the Scottish highlands may take longer than normal advertised delivery schedules e.g. more than 30 days.
> The 24 hour and Saturday delivery services do not apply and if selected will be refunded.
> Customers will be contacted either by phone call, text message or via email by our courier to provide detailed delivery information. Please ensure your account contact details are up to date as we cannot be held responsible for delays due to any inadequate information provided.
> If you are out at the agreed delivery slot redelivery charges may apply.
> If you refuse more than two potential delivery dates we offer we reserve the right to refund your order.
> Delivery to ground floor room only. Extra charges apply to upstairs locations.
> If you have any delivery queries please call our specialist delivery team on 0845 164 1712.

WARRANTIES:
> 5 Year main frame
> 1 Year Canvas, skirt etc
> 1 Year all consumables
> 3 month underlay
> Please note: Warranty period starts from day of delivery
> This Warranty does not extend to defects caused by neglect or misuse.



For our full range of Boxing Rings visit Lonsdale

The Lonsdale Deluxe 14Ft Training Ring is a fantastic addition to any boxing gym, complete with M10 rope tensioners and corner pads to each corner along with a 15mm shock absorbing foam underlay with heavy duty canvas cover. This boxing training ring also features a standard 12" platform with 18mm plywood boards for a solid platform, finally the colour coded framework allow quick assembly.

> Boxing ring
> 14 foot platform with 12 foot fighting area
> Heavy duty canvas with brass eyelets and bungee cords
> 15mm shock absorbing foam underlay
> Colour coded framework for quick assembly
> Heavy gauge 3-5mm steel construction
> 18mm plywood boards
> Blue ring skirts are supplied with bungee cords and hooks
> 4 cornerpads
> M10 rope tensioners for each corner
> Ring rope tape supplied
> Installation time approximately 45 minutes (2 people)

DELIVERY:
> After placing your order you will receive a call from our specialist delivery team within 3 working days to discuss your delivery. We will endeavour to provide a AM or PM delivery slot of no more than 5 hours in length, however, this may not be possible in all instances.
> Delivery is free to mainland UK but can take up to 30 working days, some remote postcodes in the Scottish highlands may take longer than normal advertised delivery schedules e.g. more than 30 days.
> The 24 hour and Saturday delivery services do not apply and if selected will be refunded.
> Customers will be contacted either by phone call, text message or via email by our courier to provide detailed delivery information. Please ensure your account contact details are up to date as we cannot be held responsible for delays due to any inadequate information provided.
> If you are out at the agreed delivery slot redelivery charges may apply.
> If you refuse more than two potential delivery dates we offer we reserve the right to refund your order.
> Delivery to ground floor room only. Extra charges apply to upstairs locations.
> If you have any delivery queries please call our specialist delivery team on 0845 164 1712.

WARRANTIES:
> 5 Year main frame
> 1 Year Canvas, skirt etc
> 1 Year all consumables
> 3 month underlay
> Please note: Warranty period starts from day of delivery
> This Warranty does not extend to defects caused by neglect or misuse.
